page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A questionnaire completed by fifty children showed that the most common number of children in the family was 2. Seven had 2 brothers or sisters and six were only children. They all had at least one grandma and grandpa but some had two. Not many grandparents lived nearby like they used to. Saturdays and Sundays are quite different from other days probably because usually the family are together. On Saturday a lot of people go shopping in Tunbridge Wells in the morning. In the afternoon all sorts of sports and activities take place. Sundays are usually much quieter days, in the morning some families go to church. In the afternoon lots of people go to the coast or for long country walks, but some spend a peaceful afternoon at home or with their grandparents.
